Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group's getaway into the woods dissolves into a full-throttle fight for their lives when unwelcome aliens invade

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group's getaway into the woods dissolves into a full-throttle fight for their lives when unwelcome aliens invade(n)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar(n)

programme.title: Sexipede
programme.desc: A doctor tries to prove an unknown creature materializes inside human bodies during sex by romping with her until she can capture it(n)

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: An American news crew, determined to capture a voracious monster and stop his demonic rampage, travel deep within the darkest reaches of the African jungle to hunt their prey. But Gustave, as the natives call him, is also on the hunt - always on the move, always elusive, always hungry for human flesh. Inspired by the true story of a legendary 25-foot man-eating crocodile, starring Dominic Purcell and Orlando Jones(n)

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire(n)

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno(n)

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Halloween (2007)
programme.desc: Director Rob Zombie reimagines a horror classic with this box office smash that begins anew the story of deranged serial killer Michael Myers (Tyler Mane) and his reign of homicidal wrath over a sleepy, unsuspecting town. Malcolm McDowell, Brad Dourif, William Forsythe, Udo Kier, Dee Wallace, Danny Trejo and Adrienne Barbeau costar in this terrifying remake

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself

programme.title: Gary Owen: I Got My Associates
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Gary Owen shares stories of being married to the daughter of a founding member of the Black Panthers, being the father of young teenagers and, of course, his hillbilly family. Filmed at the Stardome in Hoover, Alabama, the special also includes Gary recounting his time in the military, celebrity weddings and bumping into Lebron James in the bathroom

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as a married man whose long-suppressed sexual identity slowly emerges when he picks up a male hooker and pays him for companionship rather than sex, causing his life of predictable normalcy to unravel

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: The Artist
programme.desc: Satirical comedy starring Iwan Rheon and Rupert Grint that reimagines the megalomaniac dictator as an 18-year-old oddball who dreams of nothing other than becoming a famous painter

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

programme.title: The Skulls III
programme.desc: A gutsy college co-ed decides it is time for The Skulls (the highly secret society for ‘men only' at her college) to allow women to join. It's well known that people who are members of The Skulls have advantages over others for the rest of their lives by virtue of being part of the Skulls brotherhood. It's not easy for her because her boyfriend is very eager to be ‘tapped' and she could ease him out. She takes the chance, however, and astonishes the old boys club with her request to be considered

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Jermaine Fowler: Give'em Hell Kid
programme.desc: Comedian Jermaine Fowler performs his first ever stand-up special, dissecting his life in hilarious detail from his childhood to dealing with Internet trolls and his "special" brother

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: The Artist
programme.desc: Satirical comedy starring Iwan Rheon and Rupert Grint that reimagines the megalomaniac dictator as an 18-year-old oddball who dreams of nothing other than becoming a famous painter

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A young teenager, Abe (Jacob Zachar), manipulates the unsuspecting help of his alcoholic Uncle Mort (John Malkovich) to buy a boat from a con man named Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy

programme.title: Southland Tales
programme.desc: On July 4, 2008, Los Angeles stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros is an action star stricken with amnesia. His life intertwines with Krysta Now, an adult film star developing her own reality television project, and David Clark, a Hermosa Beach police officer who holds the key to a vast conspiracy

programme.title: Halloween (2007)
programme.desc: Director Rob Zombie reimagines a horror classic with this box office smash that begins anew the story of deranged serial killer Michael Myers (Tyler Mane) and his reign of homicidal wrath over a sleepy, unsuspecting town. Malcolm McDowell, Brad Dourif, William Forsythe, Udo Kier, Dee Wallace, Danny Trejo and Adrienne Barbeau costar in this terrifying remake(n)

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: A real-life medical phenomenon forms the basis of this gripping psychological thriller about a young man who is paralyzed on an operating table by anesthesia but totally conscious and able to feel everything his surgeon is doing. Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba and Terrence Howard star(n)

programme.title: Religulous
programme.desc: Cynically witty sociopolitical critic Bill Maher stars in this lacerating dissection of religious beliefs in such varied capitals of faith as the Vatican, Salt Lake City and Jerusalem, leaving no theological stone unturned, even those of Maher's own family members(n)

programme.title: Premature
programme.desc: A teenage boy is forced to relive the same life-changing day over and over again as he attempts to get into college and lose his virginity to the hottest girl in school(n)

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: An American Rhapsody
programme.desc: The daughter of Budapest intellectuals (Tony Goldwyn and Nastassja Kinski), 15-year-old Suzanne (Scarlett Johansson) was raised by a childless couple in rural Hungary before being reunited with her parents, living in Los Angeles. Now, feeling out of place in the land of Elvis and the cheeseburger, rebellious Suzanne returns to Hungary to reconnect with her family's history(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life(n)

programme.title: Can't Hardly Wait
programme.desc: The graduation ceremony is over at Huntington Hills High, and it's time for the real festivities to begin at the graduation party. Aspiring writer Preston Meyers (Ethan Embry) has been carrying a torch for class knockout Amanda Beckett (Jennifer Love Hewitt) for years. His tormented infatuation culminates at the party, where he seizes the opportunity to declare his love for her after she is dumped by her jock boyfriend (Peter Facinelli). Relationships and friendships are broken and formed(n)

programme.title: Hellion
programme.desc: Aaron Paul stars as a hard-drinking single father who is struggling to raise his two boys, including a rebellious teenager who becomes involved in the high-risk world of motocross and whose increasingly dangerous behavior threatens to pull the family apart. Also stars Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Smoke Signals
programme.desc: A stoic young Coeur d'Alene man grudgingly allows his nerdy friend to travel with him from their home on an Idaho reservation to Phoenix, Arizona, in order to settle the affairs of his recently-deceased alcoholic father. Along the way, the truth about a childhood tragedy unites them, along with revelations about what it takes to be a real Native American. Irene Bedard costars(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it(n)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency

programme.title: Cold Creek Manor
programme.desc: Cooper Tilson (Dennis Quaid) and his wife Leah (Golden Globe winner Sharon Stone) are New Yorkers wanting to escape city life for the saner, safer countryside. They move their two children into a dilapidated old mansion filled with the possessions of the previous family. Turning it into their dream house becomes a living nightmare when the previous owner (Stephen Dorff) shows up, and a series of terrifying incidents leads them on a search for clues to the estate's dark and lurid past

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special

programme.title: Citizen Ruth
programme.desc: An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: Vivekachudamani: 51
programme.desc: In episode 110, Tommy and Michael's long-lost father Neil resurfaces just as Rose realizes she can no longer deny the fact that Michael is a gangster; Pete tries to help Eileen(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Graphic Violence

programme.title: Matthew 22:10
programme.desc: In episode 111, the season one finale, Michael's criminal shadow hangs over everyone when all of The Hill comes together at a big Irish wedding, where a recently paroled hit man has orders to kill Michael, and Tommy narrowly avoids a legal trap(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Born To Be Blue
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke stars as jazz legend Chet Baker in this biopic that zeroes in on a key moment in the 1960s, just as the all-but-washed-up musician attempts to stage a comeback, spurred in part by a passionate romance with a new flame

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

Joel continues to visit Kia - and finds himself enjoying taking on Charlie's role in this ready-made family. Meanwhile, back at the house, Charlie's increasingly intimate spiritual guru act convinces Nadia to try and clean herself up(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Mild Violence

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Lavell is back home in St. Louis in his new comedy special. He discusses every holiday from what Christmas was like when he was a kid, to the guilt everyone feels on Mother's Day, to Thanksgiving and his family trips to Disneyland

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: For Luke McNamara, an invitation to join the prestigious college organization, the Skulls, would be a dream come true. Luke's fortunes change when he is tapped for entry into the highly selective secret society. Unknown to Luke, his friend Will has infiltrated the Skulls' inner sanctum to write an expose and commits suicide under suspicious circumstances. Luke is forced to confront the possibility that Will was murdered. He embarks on a deadly game of cat and mouse, and learns that the truth, like success, often comes at a very high price

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict. Stars Kristen Wiig and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Black Sabbath - The End of The End
programme.desc: Chronicles the final tour from Black Sabbath. On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: For Luke McNamara, an invitation to join the prestigious college organization, the Skulls, would be a dream come true. Luke's fortunes change when he is tapped for entry into the highly selective secret society. Unknown to Luke, his friend Will has infiltrated the Skulls' inner sanctum to write an expose and commits suicide under suspicious circumstances. Luke is forced to confront the possibility that Will was murdered. He embarks on a deadly game of cat and mouse, and learns that the truth, like success, often comes at a very high price

programme.title: Maximum Risk
programme.desc: Alain Moreau (Jean-Claude Van Damme) doesn't know he has a twin brother until he finds him lying dead on the streets of his European hometown. To find out who his brother was, Alain decides to step into his shoes. He becomes Mikhail and follows his footsteps back to New York's tough Little Odessa into a shadowy underworld. In assuming Mikhail's identity, Alain leaves everything he knows behind and submerges himself into a dangerous underworld. On top of everything, traces of Mikhail's life start disappearing

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Two best friends (Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon) set out on an adventure. It soon turns into a terrifying escape from the police after they go on crime spree across the American southwest. Brad Pitt co-stars

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael Jennings (Ben Affleck) is being hunted, but he doesn't know why. A famous genius hired by high-tech corporations, Jennings routinely has his memory erased once a job is completed so as not to divulge any company secrets. He expects to earn eight figures for his latest project, but upon finishing the work, he is given an envelope full of random objects and told that he has agreed to forfeit all payment. With his memory erased per his contract, Jennings has no defense, until he discovers that the objects are clues to his past(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice(n)

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: Liz (Dakota Fanning) is full of heart and grit but is being hunted by a vengeful Preacher (Guy Pearce) who is a diabolical zealot. She's a genuine survivor and uses her strength to claim the better life she and her daughter deserve(n)

programme.title: Body of Deceit
programme.desc: Alice (Kristanna Loken) is a ghostwriter for a famous author. She is halfway through the work of his new book, but cannot write anymore. A year has passed since she had a terrible accident in Malta where she was staying with her husband Max (Antonio Cupo) in his family villa and was in a coma for two weeks. Since then, she has been suffering from depression and has recurrent and cryptic nightmares. Max persuades her to go back to Malta in the hopes that something will unblock her mind so she can start working again and meet her deadline(n)

programme.title: Maximum Risk
programme.desc: Alain Moreau (Jean-Claude Van Damme) doesn't know he has a twin brother until he finds him lying dead on the streets of his European hometown. To find out who his brother was, Alain decides to step into his shoes. He becomes Mikhail and follows his footsteps back to New York's tough Little Odessa into a shadowy underworld. In assuming Mikhail's identity, Alain leaves everything he knows behind and submerges himself into a dangerous underworld. On top of everything, traces of Mikhail's life start disappearing(n)

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension(n)

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers (2001)
programme.desc: Experts at seducing and fleecing wealthy men, mother-daughter grifters Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt arrive in Palm Beach, Florida, where they target an aging tobacco baron (Gene Hackman) and the owner (Jason Lee) of a beachside tavern. Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft and Nora Dunn costar in this comedy from the writer of "Liar Liar."(n)

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone)(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

programme.title: In the Bedroom
programme.desc: The Fowlers are a typical family in Maine. Matt is the town doctor and loves to fish. His wife, Ruth, is the school's choir leader, and their son, Frank, is home from his first year of college. Frank is in love with Natalie, a mother who isn't quite divorced yet from her husband, Richard. It makes Richard's blood boil to see his wife running around with another man. The affair takes a sudden and tragic turn, and the Fowlers are forced to confront the harsh reality of their situation(n)

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Jet Li stars as real life martial arts legend Huo Yuanjia, who becomes the most famous and revered fighter in all of China. Along the way, he creates the Jin Wu Sports Federation, and comes to be it's spiritual guru(n)

programme.title: United 93
programme.desc: The unflinching story of the passengers, crew and flight controllers who watched in dawning horror as United Airlines Flight 93 became the fourth hijacked plane on the day of the worst terrorist attacks on American soil on September 11, 2001. They takeoff, witness the hijacking and realize that their plane is part of a coordinated attack unfolding on the ground beneath them. Directed by Paul Greengrass

programme.title: 2017 Week 13
programme.desc: Emmy® Award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Brandon Marshall

programme.title: Season With Navy Football, A: Episode 12
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Niumatalolo and the Midshipmen as they prepare for an annual tradition and highlight of the season: the Army-Navy game

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: An incriminating video of Floyd makes its way around the internet, jeopardizing his relationship with Kali and igniting controversy in the black community. While Sadie responds with silence, Teddy extends an olive branch and offers Floyd a surprising refuge from the media hate-storm(c)

programme.title: Channel Sex News
programme.desc: When a beautiful TV producer swaps lives with a gorgeous high-class escort for a news story, they both take a wild trip into an alternate lifestyle as high stakes drama and steamy sex hit the 11 o'clock news

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Lavell is back home in St. Louis in his new comedy special. He discusses every holiday from what Christmas was like when he was a kid, to the guilt everyone feels on Mother's Day, to Thanksgiving and his family trips to Disneyland

programme.title: Urban Legend: Final Cut
programme.desc: Chilling horror sequel about aspiring filmmaker Amy (Jenny Morrison), who tackles the subject of urban legends for the bloody splatter movie she's shooting as her college thesis project. As she recreates gruesome murders with her cast and crew, Amy's fictional slayings begin coming to life, resulting in a grisly mystery that must be solved before the next terrifying death. Loretta Devine, Hart Bochner, Rebecca Gayheart, Joey Lawrence, Matthew Davis and Anson Mount costar in this scary sequel to "Urban Legend."

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). Soon they're embroiled in a complex scheme to steal a priceless relic from a Canadian customs house, but revealed secrets and double-crosses are just around the corner

programme.title: The Rundown
programme.desc: Travis (Seann William Scott) is a fast-talking double dealer whose dad commissions Beck (The Rock) to retrieve him from an adventure in Brazil. Travis is more of a handful than Beck expects and not just because of his mouth. He brings a couple of other complications with him: Mariana (Rosario Dawson), a no-nonsense local who holds the answers to some of the jungle's mysteries and Hatcher (Christopher Walken), an unhinged despot who has turned the raw jungle and its inhabitants into his own fortune-making, gold-mining empire

programme.title: Nemr: No Bombing in Beirut
programme.desc: In this special filmed in both Lebanon and America, Nemr puts together an hour of uproarious comedy capturing thousands of people from the Middle East and America laughing at the same jokes, told by the same man. From his childhood in America, to his later years in Lebanon, Nemr recounts his life and touches on childhood, family, relationships, religion, war and the power of perspective

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers

programme.title: 2017 Week 13
programme.desc: Emmy® Award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Brandon Marshall(c)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide

programme.title: The Rundown
programme.desc: Travis (Seann William Scott) is a fast-talking double dealer whose dad commissions Beck (The Rock) to retrieve him from an adventure in Brazil. Travis is more of a handful than Beck expects and not just because of his mouth. He brings a couple of other complications with him: Mariana (Rosario Dawson), a no-nonsense local who holds the answers to some of the jungle's mysteries and Hatcher (Christopher Walken), an unhinged despot who has turned the raw jungle and its inhabitants into his own fortune-making, gold-mining empire

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: It's three days to the millennium and Satan (Gabriel Byrne) has come to New York looking for a bride. Arnold Schwarzenegger plays a down on his luck alcoholic cop who must protect the woman (Robin Tunney) that Satan picks

programme.title: Frampton vs. Santa Cruz II (R)
programme.desc: Undefeated featherweight Carl Frampton in a world title rematch against three-division champion Leo Santa Cruz. Plus, lightweight Dejan Zlaticanin defends his belt against fan fave Mikey Garcia. Live from MGM Grand in Vegas. REPLAY(c)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium

programme.title: Season With Navy Football, A: Episode 12
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Niumatalolo and the Midshipmen as they prepare for an annual tradition and highlight of the season: the Army-Navy game(c)

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: The two friends go on more drug-influenced misadventures, as Cheech must deal with losing his job and Chong parties in Hollywood. Featuring the screen debut of Pee Wee Herman (Paul Reubens)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard

programme.title: Beverly Hills Ninja
programme.desc: An orphan is found washed up on the shores of Japan as a baby and raised at a secret Japanese dojo. The ninjas believe the child, Haru (Chris Farley) could be the Great White Ninja foretold in legend. He gets the chance to prove himself when the beautiful Allison persuades him to embark on a dangerous mission into the wilds of Beverly Hills. With the help of his ninja brother, and a new American friend, Haru uncovers a plot much larger than he expected

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Hank Mitchell (Bill Paxton) is a humble small town store manager that, with his dimwitted brother Jacob (Billy Bob Thornton) discovers a long-lost bag of money in a plane wreck. The money can only be ill-gotten booty, but in a moment of weakness the brothers take the loot and fail to report the crash - a decision that will have tragic consequences. Bridget Fonda costars in this thriller from director Sam Raimi ("Spider-Man") based on the best-selling novel by Scott Smith

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A psychotic killer takes recreates the mythical "urban legends" that circulate through America's schools with flawless accuracy on a besieged college campus in this teen slasher flick. The all-star cast of this box office hit includes Alicia Witt, Tara Reid, Rebecca Gayheart, Jared Leto, Joshua Jackson, Loretta Devine, Robert Englund, John Neville, Natasha Wagner and Brad Dourif

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency

programme.title: Showtime Boxing International: Davis vs. Walsh (R)
programme.desc: Relive super featherweight champ Gervonta Davis taking on the first defense of his title against undefeated contender Liam Walsh(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Searing account of the Vietnam War's first major battle starring Mel Gibson as Lt. Col. Hal Moore, who refuses to yield to the overwhelming numbers of his determined enemy during a bloody 1965 clash in the Drang Valley. Madeleine Stowe and Barry Pepper costar in this true-life chronicle(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Ninja

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: Battlefield Earth
programme.desc: It's the year 3000 and man is an endangered species. After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race, humanity begins to fight back. John Travolta stars as Terl, the security chief of Earth. Also starring Forrest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: A Game of Honor
programme.desc: This feature length documentary captures a never-before-seen look at the Division 1 football teams at the U.S. Military Academy at West Point and the U.S. Naval Academy at Annapolis, rigorous programs of military training, elite classroom education and athletic preparation for their cadets and midshipmen that culminates each year in the Army-Navy Football Game, an institution in American sports(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: America's most hardened and dangerous criminals are transported via Con Air, a customized armored aircraft equipped with armed guards, hand and leg shackles, and top secret destinations. No one has ever escaped from one of these flying fortresses. A group of violent and deadly cons seizes control of one of the planes, taking the guards hostage and setting a course out of the country. Poe, an inmate who has done his time and is being shipped home to be reunited with his family, proves to be a fly in their ointment(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate navigates emotional and cultural land mines when she accepts a position as nanny to the spoiled, bratty child of a demanding, wealthy Manhattan couple in this comedy based on the best-selling novel. Scarlett Johansson, Laura Linney, Paul Giamatti, Chris Evans, Alicia Keys and Nicholas Art star

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: I Am David
programme.desc: A young boy named David (Ben Tibber) flees a Communist prison camp in 1950's Bulgaria and embarks on a remarkable cross-cultural odyssey to deliver a letter to a stranger in Denmark. James Caviezel and Joan Plowright costar in this moving drama based on the novel "North to Freedom" by Anne Holm and directed by Paul Feig of TV's "Freaks and Geeks."

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star(n)

Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old Philadelphia girl (Elisha Cuthbert) from the 20th Century travels through time with a couple of pals (Gabrielle Boni, Matthew Harbour) from the 19th Century in this family adventure with Timothy Busfield and Michael Sinelnikoff(n)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork(n)

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change

programme.title: Good Advice
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as a successful stockbroker who, after losing his fortune on a bad stock tip, decides to secretly write into his ex-girlfriend's less-than-successful advice column, setting of a romantic chain of events. Also stars Denise Richards and Rosanna Arquette

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict. Stars Kristen Wiig and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)

programme.title: High Hopes
programme.desc: While Rubio gets trumped in Florida, the rest of the candidates remain cautiously optimistic. But are high hopes what they need to pull off a win and secure the nomination - or are they just delusional?(c)

programme.title: Home And Abroad
programme.desc: Foreign policy comes to the fore as the political climate grows fiery in the wake of the attacks in Brussels. As Trump and Clinton prepare to square off, can either of them prove their presidential mettle in handling the heat?(c)

programme.title: On Wisconsin
programme.desc: Ahead of a Wisconsin showdown the candidates crisscross the state in pursuit of competing agendas. Can Kasich, Cruz or Sanders secure their position as spoilers - or will Clinton and Trump finally be crowned their party's Big Cheese?(c)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)
